thread.title: Brazil: Brazil corruption probe targets firms, former minister close to dam project

author: Benjamin Villaraza
title: Brazil: Brazil corruption probe targets firms, former minister close to dam project
text:
March 12th, 2018 South America 
Brazilian police on Friday served fresh search warrants in a new phase of the so-called “Car Wash” investigation that targeted a former cabinet minister and a consortium accused of corruption relating to construction of the Belo Monte hydroelectric dam. 
Federal police said in a statement they were serving nine search warrants in the states of Parana and Sao Paulo. 
Police have alleged that the Norte Energia SA consortium of companies made illegal payments to government officials and politicians to win the contract to build the dam, which has been in operation since 2016. 
The full original article can be found at reuters.com
